verbs.description: sunset [V: will] reach sunrise calendar on august 31 as focus shifts to outlook the current sunrise calendar app will be removed from the ios app store in a few more days and will stop working on installed devices after august 31 this is due to the sunrise team being acquired by microsoft to work on the outlook mobile app august 31 microsoft sunrise
